text.textblock: This is to provide notice as required by 49 U.S.C. 10524(b)(1) that the named corporations intend to provide or use compensated intercorporate hauling operations as authorized in 49 U.S.C. 10524(b).
1. Parent corporation and address of principal office: Orion Enterprises, Inc., 2930 West Maple Street, P.O. Box 780, Sioux Falls, SD 57101. State of Incorporation: South Dakota.
2. Wholly-owned subsidiaries which will participate in the operations and states of incorporation:

doctitle.textblock: Notice of Intent to Engage in Compensated Intercorporate Hauling Operations
